short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves information/display for Displate limited editions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension improves the display of limited editions on Displate by showing how much stock is/was available.

Source code: https://github.com/dlew/displate-inventory-extension
